string-array.name: place_desc
string-array.item: Roman General. Avenged Rome after Teutoberg Forest Disaster.
Right hand man of Augustus. Brilliant military commander and architect.
Succeeded Julius Caesar. Considered Romes most effective emperor.
Conqueror of Gaul and Britania, lover of Cleopatra, defeated Pompey the Great
Succeeded Tiberius. Several successful building projects.
